articles.title: Neil Diamond surprises audience with 'Sweet Caroline' performance at Broadway opening - KOCO Oklahoma City
articles.description: It was a rare public outing for the singer, who stopped touring in 2018 due to his Parkinson's diagnosis.
articles.content:
Neil Diamond sang "Sweet Caroline" at the Broadway opening of his musical" A Beautiful Noise," five years after retiring due to his Parkinson's diagnosis.

articles.title: HBO Max back on Amazon Prime Video Channels: Streamers reach deal - USA TODAY
articles.description: HBO Max is once again available on Prime Video Channels in the U.S., but Prime customers will still need to pay $14.99 per month for the subscription.
articles.content:
HBO Max and Amazon have made up bringing the streaming service back to Amazon Prime Video Channels.
